channel.title: Npc drops
channel.description:
My npcdrops isnt working... I have 6 npcdrop files... One is java, two are tsm but so random i cant read them, two more are tsm and I can read them but when I make changes nothing happens.. and the last one is class.. for example:
#Dust Devil 1624:100 560:75 1093:1 1147:1 1127:1 1185:1 1275:1 1333:1 1373:1 562:75 805:10 3140:1 1249:1
Thats my dust devils drops... In two files it looks exactly like this. However, all they drop is bones!!! I dont know what the problem is? I even added frost dragons id with a drop rate of one.. and the only thing i put for drops was frtost dragon bones... and all they drop is charms.. I even have the problem of my bosses such as kbd...
#king black dragon 50:1 11335:1 555:150 565:150 805:20 830:20 1079:1 1303:1 1373:1 4131:1 1213:1 1147:1 1113:1 560:250 1359:1 892:150 1185:1 1249:1 1616:2 1149:1 1187:1 2366:1 4585:1 11286:1 2366:1 11335:1 2366:1 2366:1 11286:1
Yet all he drops is bones and black dragon leather and the occasional charm. HELPPPP PLEASEEEE!!!!!!!

item.title: Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

My npcdrops isnt working… I have 6 npcdrop files… One is java, two are tsm but so random i cant read them, two more are tsm and I can read them but when I make changes nothing happens… and the last one is class… for example:

#Dust Devil
1624:100 560:75 1093:1 1147:1 1127:1 1185:1 1275:1 1333:1 1373:1 562:75 805:10
3140:1 1249:1

Thats my dust devils drops… In two files it looks exactly like this. However, all they drop is bones!!! I dont know what the problem is? I even added frost dragons id with a drop rate of one… and the only thing i put for drops was frtost dragon bones… and all they drop is charms… I even have the problem of my bosses such as kbd…

#king black dragon
50:1 11335:1 555:150 565:150 805:20 830:20 1079:1 1303:1 1373:1 4131:1 1213:1 1147:1 1113:1 560:250 1359:1 892:150 1185:1 1249:1 1616:2
1149:1 1187:1 2366:1 4585:1 11286:1 2366:1 11335:1 2366:1 2366:1 11286:1

Yet all he drops is bones and black dragon leather and the occasional charm.
HELPPPP PLEASEEEE!!!
